title: Topic 001 Question 076
body: You need to migrate a 1 TB PostgreSQL database from a Compute Engine VM to Cloud SQL for PostgreSQL. You want to ensure that there is minimal downtime during the migration. What should you do?
options: Export the data from the existing database, and load the data into a new Cloud SQL database.
Use Migrate for Compute Engine to complete the migration.
Use Datastream to complete the migration.
Use Database Migration Service to complete the migration.
